title: PGVCL Notification 2026 - Apply Offline for Company Secretary Posts
description: The Paschim Gujarat Vij Company (PGVCL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Company Secretary Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree can apply for the PGVCL Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, sala...
